mapper.select: select * from comment_tb where b_idx = #{ b_idx } order by cmt_idx desc
mapper.insert: insert into comment_tb values( seq_comment_tb_idx.nextVal, #{ cmt_content }, #{ cmt_ip }, sysdate, #{ b_idx }, #{ mem_idx }, #{ mem_name } )
mapper.delete: delete from comment_tb where cmt_idx=#{ cmt_idx }
